name: Mercure Atenea Aventura

reviews.text: Decided on this hotel as a base for a 2 day visit to the Port Aventura theme park based on the reviews on here and was not disappointed. Managed to find a Sunday night booking for £55 including breakfast for a double room for 2 people which is fantastic value compared to the steep costs to stay on site within the Port Aventura complex.
reviews.title: Great Value & Great Hotel Very Close to Port Aventura

likes.liked: — Price and the quality of the rooms and food
likes.disliked: — Couldn't find British TV channels mentioned in the brochure - minor thing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hotel is easy to find from the exit of Port Aventura less than 5 mins away at the next motorway junction and is a prominent position in the main square as you enter Vila Seca with decent parking both within the hotel complex and on the street outside.
reviews.title: A great hotel!
Bright, spacious friendly hotel
reviews.text: Inside the hotel is cool, modern spacious and spotless with friendly reception staff. The room was large and clean with a small kitchen area, living room area and separate bedroom with swish bathroom suite with good powerful shower and bath. Breakfast was typical good standard continental style with pretty much all tastes catered for.
Only saw the pool and spa but didn't get to use them due to time restrictions but they looked good.
reviews.title: Not very friendly

aka: Aparthotel Atenea Aventura Hotel Vila Seca
